channel.title: 2.2.6 DevOps on 计算机学习笔记
channel.description: Recent content in 2.2.6 DevOps on 计算机学习笔记

item.title: Ansible
item.description: Ansible # ansible/ansible Ansible is a radically simple IT automation platform that makes your applications and systems easier to deploy and maintain. Automate everything from code deployment to network configuration to cloud management, in a language that approaches plain English, using SSH, with no agents to install on remote systems.
